wikipedia_page.main: The Ven (Reginald) Brian Harris (b 14 August 1934)  was  Archdeacon of Manchester from 1980  to 1998.He was educated at Eltham College and Christ's College, Cambridge After curacies in Wednesbury and Uttoxeter he held incumbencies in Bury and Bolton. He was the Rural Dean of Walmsley from 1970 to 1980;  and a Canon Residentiary at Manchester Cathedral from 1980 until 1998.

response: * Brian Harris, ex-drummer for the Greek power metal band Firewind
* Brian Harris, guitar player for the band Lord Tracy
* Brian Lake (born 1982), Australian rules footballer formerly known as Brian Harris
* Brian Harris (translation researcher) (born 1929), Canadian and British translation researcher
